items.sentence: Tom was unwilling to pay that much money for a secondhand computer.
Tom was vacuuming the rug while Mary was mopping the kitchen floor.
Tom helped the teacher decorate the classroom for Valentine\'s Day.
Tom was wearing a bulletproof vest, so the bullet didn\'t kill him.
Tom felt like going home and left without saying goodbye to anyone.
As soon as I can figure out how to send money, I\'ll send you some.
I don\'t often go to Boston, but every time I do, I enjoy it a lot.
Tom couldn\'t help but notice all the beautiful women on the beach.
Tom didn\'t come to school today because he had to go to a funeral.
Tom didn\'t want to live in the cave anymore, but he had no choice.
